title: They quit, traveled, and rethought their lives — meet the adults taking gap years
full_text: They quit, traveled, and rethought their lives — meet the adults taking gap years. Extended time off can carry long-term costs — lower earnings, disrupted savings, slower compounding — but for some, the benefits outweigh the risks.. Getty Images; Alyssa Powell/BI In my early 30s, I was working long hours as the editor in chief of a magazine, juggling deadlines and the looming "should we have kids?" question — all while feeling … [+2795 chars]
